item.title: Megan add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "No one can make you feel inferior without your consent." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Megan add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I am so clever that sometimes I don't understand a single word of what I am saying." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Megan add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "That which does not kill us makes us stronger." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Megan add a quote by Paul Terry
item.description: "Whenever I feel the need to exercise, I lie down until it goes away." -- Paul Terry

item.title: Megan add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "I like nonsense, it wakes up the brain cells. Fantasy is a necessary ingredient in living." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Megan add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "A pessimist sees the difficulty in every opportunity; an optimist sees the opportunity in every difficulty." -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: Megan add a quote by Narcotics Anonymous
item.description: "Insanity is doing the same thing, over and over again, but expecting different results." -- Narcotics Anonymous

item.title: Megan add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "I love deadlines. I love the whooshing noise they make as they go by." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Megan add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Always forgive your enemies; nothing annoys them so much." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Megan add a quote by Linda Grayson
item.description: "There is nothing better than a friend, unless it is a friend with chocolate." -- Linda Grayson

item.title: Megan add a quote by F. Scott Fitzgerald
item.description: "I fell in love with her courage, her sincerity, and her flaming self respect. And it's these things I'd believe in, even if the whole world indulged in wild suspicions that she wasn't all she should be. I love her and it is the beginning of everything." -- F. Scott Fitzgerald

item.title: Megan add a quote by F. Scott Fitzgerald
item.description: "You see I usually find myself among strangers because I drift here and there trying to forget the sad things that happened to me." -- F. Scott Fitzgerald

item.title: Megan add a quote by Timothy Leary
item.description: "Admit it. You aren’t like them. You’re not even close. You may occasionally dress yourself up as one of them, watch the same mindless television shows as they do, maybe even eat the same fast food sometimes. But it seems that the more you try to fit in, the more you feel like an outsider, watching the “normal people” as they go about their automatic existences. For every time you say club passwords like “Have a nice day” and “Weather’s awful today, eh?”, you yearn inside to say forbidden things like “Tell me something that makes you cry” or “What do you think deja vu is for?”. Face it, you even want to talk to that girl in the elevator. But what if that girl in the elevator (and the balding man who walks past your cubicle at work) are thinking the same thing? Who knows what you might learn from taking a chance on conversation with a stranger? Everyone carries a piece of the puzzle. Nobody comes into your life by mere coincidence. Trust your instincts. Do the unexpected. Find the others…" -- Timothy Leary

item.title: Megan add a quote by John Steinbeck
item.description: "You can boast about anything if it's all you have. Maybe the less you have, the more you are required to boast." -- John Steinbeck

item.title: Megan add a quote by Henry James
item.description: "There are few hours in life more agreeable than the hour dedicated to the ceremony known as afternoon tea." -- Henry James

item.title: Megan add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "Sometimes, if you stand on the bottom rail of a bridge and lean over to watch the river slipping slowly away beneath you, you will suddenly know everything there is to be known." -- A.A. Milne

item.title: Megan add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "Don't underestimate the value of Doing Nothing, of just going along, listening to all the things you can't hear, and not bothering." -- A.A. Milne

item.title: Megan add a quote by A.A. Milne
Megan add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "Weeds are flowers, too, once you get to know them." -- A.A. Milne

item.title: Megan add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "People say nothing is impossible, but I do nothing every day." -- A.A. Milne

item.title: Megan add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "One of the advantages of being disorganized is that one is always having surprising discoveries." -- A.A. Milne
